practiceAreas: Medical Malpractice|Birth Injury|Misdiagnosis|Surgical Errors|Prescription Drug Mistakes|Anesthesia Failures
description:
Medical malpractice is the primary focus of The Law Offices of Dan F. Partin in Lexington, Kentucky. We provide invaluable counsel and support to clients throughout the state. These are people who have suffered serious injuries or lost loved ones as the results of medical professionals' negligence or wrongdoing.

Our law firm's attorneys possess decades of combined legal experience. This means that you can rely on us to fight on your behalf to increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcomes you seek for your personal injury or wrongful death claims arising from any of the following:

  • Physician, nurse and emergency medical technician (EMT) malpractice
  • Birth injuries
  • Misdiagnoses
  • Surgical errors/surgeon negligence
  • Prescription medication errors
  • Sedation mistakes
  • Medical errors that result in death
  • Hospital and nursing home falls and injuries

No matter what the cause of your suffering is, you have rights, and you can count on us to aggressively assert and protect those rights and entitlements as we pursue the maximum amount of compensation you need. We provide personal attention for every client that we serve. Our team will provide valuable insight when discussing your legal options and guide you toward making the best possible decisions.

To date, we have helped hundreds of clients obtain justice in the wake of a preventable tragedy. We are always ready to advocate for you to help you make your life whole again as you focus on recovery and get back to what matters most to you.

To begin the process, you can contact The Law Offices of Dan F. Partin for a free initial consultation. We also currently offer virtual consultations to help keep you safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
